40852.「私は <%sM_timei>国より\n 任命された チーム大使。\n 今日は:
Hello. I am <%sM_timei>'s government
appointed Team Ambassador.
What can I do for you today?
<break>

40853.「ああ 残念ですが\n お金が 足りないようです…。<bw_break>: Oh, I'm afraid I don't have enough money...<bw_break>

40854.「あっ……申し訳ありませんが\n その名前は 他のチームで使われているか\n 入:
I'm... I'm sorry, but that name is either in use by another team, or it's not a name you can enter. You'll have to enter a different
team name...

40855.「手続きが終わりましたら 登録料として\n １００００ゴールド いただきます。\:
Once you've completed the formalities, you'll be asked to pay a registration fee of 10,000 gold... The registration fee will be returned
to you when the team disbands... ... But since we're still in beta testing, we're offering a special trial price of
<%dL_TESUURYOU> gold! Would you like to register your team?

40856.「続いて チームの顔となる\n エンブレムを 決めていただきます。\n 後から変:
Next, you'll choose the emblem that will become the face of your team... If you want to change it later, you'll have to pay a
fee...

40857.「かしこまりました。\n これは 素晴らしいエンブレムです。\n メンバーの士気:
Yes, sir... This is a wonderful emblem... I'm
sure it'll raise morale among the members!<bw_break>

40858.「チームの登録料を お返ししようとしたのですが\n どうやら お金を持ちきれない:
I tried to give you back your team's registration fee, but it looks like you don't have enough money. I'll get back to you when
I have less money.

40860.「エンブレムの変更が できませんでした。\n しばらく時間を空けてから\n もう:
I can't change the emblem... Give it some
time, and then try again.<bw_break>

40862.「パーツを組み合わせて\n あなたのチームの エンブレムを\n 作ってください。:
Put the parts together to make your team's
emblem...<break>

40863.目覚めし冒険者の広場には チーム専用の掲示板が\nありますが ベータテスト・フェ:
There's a team forum in the Awakened Adventurer's Square, but it's not available during Beta Test Phase 1.
.https://hiroba.dqx.jp/sc/windowsb

40876.「取り付けには 手数料をいただきます。\n どちらのカバーにしますか？\n<br:

emblem

40878.「ああ 残念ですが\n お金が 足りないようです。\n<bw_break>:
Oh, I'm sorry, but we don't have enough
money...<bw_break>

40879.「<pc>さんが 今 装備している盾に\n 特製の 盾カバーを取り付けて\n エ:
I'm going to attach a special shield cover to the shield you're currently wearing, and make it look like an emblem... I'll use a secret
method to attach it, so the shield's performance will remain unchanged, no matter what kind of attack it receives, it will
never come off!

40881.「盾カバーの取り外しが できませんでした。\n お手数ですが 少し待ってから\n:
I can't remove the shield cover... I'm sorry,
sir, but you'll have to wait a bit and try
again.<bw_break>

40882.「盾カバーを 取り付けました！\n もし 外したくなった時は 装備した状態で\n:
The shield cover is now in place! If you ever
need to remove it, please contact your team
ambassador with it in place...<bw_break>

40883.「盾カバーを 取り付けられませんでした…。\n お手数ですが 少し待ってから\n:
I couldn't get the shield cover to fit... I
apologize for the inconvenience, but you'll
have to wait a bit and try again...<bw_break>

40884.「……ですが 今は\n 盾を 装備していないようですね。\n 装備してから また:
... But I don't think he's wearing his shield
right now. Please come back when you do...<bw_break>

40885.「スローガンを 受け付けました！\n スローガンは こまめに更新するのが\n メ:
Slogans are now being accepted! Updating your
slogan frequently is the key to strengthening
the bond between members...<bw_break>

40886.「あなたのチームの 手続きをします。\n 何を お望みでしょう？\n<break:
You'd like to change one of your designs.
Which would you like to change?
<break>

40887.「では チームのスローガンを入れてください。\n スローガンは 今ここで決めなく:
Now, please enter your team's slogan... We
don't have to decide on a slogan right now,
but we can change it at any time...<break>

40888.「冒険者よ よく来てくれました。\n 私は チーム大使。ここでは\n チームに関:
Adventurers, welcome to the... My name is Chee... We have a number of team-related procedures to follow. In response to the
crisis currently engulfing all of Astoltia, the major powers have decided to strengthen their teams. Teams are open to all
adventurers... However, each adventurer is only allowed to join one team. So if you want to join someone else's team... Or form your
own team and become its leader... That's up to you to decide. Now, when you form a team, it becomes a <%sM_timei> sanctioned team, but
there are no restrictions on the races of the members... Once you've joined a team, you'll be able to take part in team quests, chat
with other team members at any time, and much more! However, you won't be able to participate in team quests during Phase 1 of
the beta test, so you'll have to wait a little longer... We'll be staying in this village for a limited time during the beta
test. In the full game, you'll find team ambassadors in the larger cities on each continent. So, what can I do for you today?

40889.「『<%sM_team>』ですね！\n これは 気品のある 見事なお名前。\n:
"<%sM_team>"! It's a beautiful, graceful...
I'm sure they'll make a fine team!<bw_break>

40890.「<%sM_timei>公認の <pc>さんのチーム\n 『<%sL_TEAM>:
<%sM_timei> approved<pc>  s team, <%sL_TEAM>, has been born here and
now!<me_72>
<bw_break>

40891.「チームメンバーを さそう時は\n さくせんコマンドの 『チーム』から\n おこ:
If you wish to send a team member, please do so from the "Team" section of the Operation Command... If you wish to change the team
leader or emblem, or disband the team, please contact one of our team ambassadors... We have an agreement that any team ambassador
from any country can handle the team process... And that's it! Have a great team life!

40892.「チームの結成に 失敗いたしました。\n お手数ですが しばらく時間を空けてから:
I'm sorry, sir. I've failed to assemble a team. I apologize for the inconvenience, but you'll have to wait a few moments and try
again.

40893.「その言葉を待っていました！\n <pc>さんのチームを 結成いたします！\n<:
Just what I wanted to hear!
<pc>, your Team is hereby formed!
<bw_break>

40894.「おや チーム名が 入力されていませんよ。\n あなたの チームの名前を\n １:
Oh, you haven't entered your Team's name!
Please enter a name using 10 characters or
less.
<break>

40895.「冒険者よ よく来てくれました。\n 私は チーム大使。ここでは\n チームに関:
Adventurers, welcome to the... My name is Chee... We have a number of team-related procedures to follow. In response to the
crisis currently engulfing all of Astoltia, the major powers have decided to strengthen their teams. Teams are open to all
adventurers... However, each adventurer is only allowed to join one team. So if you want to join someone else's team... Or form your
own team and become its leader... That's up to you to decide. Now, when you form a team, it becomes a <%sM_timei> sanctioned team, but
there are no restrictions on the races of the members... Once you've joined a team, you'll be able to participate in team quests, chat
with other team members, and more! To participate in a quest, each member of your team must speak to one of our team
ambassadors and choose a Team Quest... So what can I do for you today?

40897.「チームの結成を やめますか？\n<yesno><break>: Do you want to stop forming teams?<yesno><break>

40898.「これを 『<%sL_TEAM>』の\n エンブレムにしますか？<yesno><:
Would you like this to be the emblem for
<%sL_TEAM>?<yesno><break>

40899.「今の組み合わせを すべて消して\n こちらで選んだパーツに 変更いたします。\:
I'd like to erase all the current
combinations and replace them with the parts
I've selected... Are you sure?<yesno><break>

40900.「おお チームを解散するのですね？\n<br>\n「解散すれば 他チームに入れる:
Ah, so you want to disband your Team?
If you do, you'll be able to join a different Team. However, all the Team Levels you've you've gained will be permanently lost.
Are you really sure you want to disband?

40901.「ユニフォームデザインを やめますか？\n<yesno 2><break>:
Do you wish to stop designing your
Team uniform?<yesno 2><break>

40902.「チーム『<%sL_TEAM>』のリーダーを\n <pc>さんから 別のメンバー:
Your Team can have its leader changed from you to someone else.

40903.「では <%sL_MEMBER>さんを\n 次のリーダーに 指名いたします。\n:

as the new Team leader?<yesno><break>

40904.「<%sL_COVER_TYPE>ですね。\n <%nL_GOLD>ゴールドです:

40907.「こちらの内容で チームを登録します。\n よろしいですか？<yesno><br:

40908.「ああっ……ですが <pc>さんは\n すでに チーム『<%sL_TEAM>』に:

need to leave that one first.

41099.「チームとは 結成した人がリーダーとなって\n 最大２５５人もの仲間と いつでも:
A team is a group of people, led by one person, who can communicate with up to 255 other people at any time via a dedicated chat
room. Every team is sponsored by a government... If you form a team here, you become a <%sM_timei>-approved team... Of
course, <%sM_timei> official means that there are no restrictions on the races of the team members! Once you've formed a team, you'll
have access to each country's team purchasing department, and you'll be able to create your own emblem to represent your team... You can
even get a shield cover with the emblem's design on it. Please have the shield in place... And lastly, it's important to note
that you can only have one team... You can't have more than one team.

61918.「チームユニフォームの変更を ご希望ですね。\n 手数料として <%nL_GOL:

61919.「これを 『<%sL_TEAM>』の\n ユニフォームにしますか？<yesno>:
Is this the uniform you'd like to use?
<yesno><break>

62263.「サブリーダーは 特別なチームの機能の使用を\n リーダーから許された 特別なメ:
A sub-leader is a special member of a team who is authorized by the leader to use special team functions... There is no limit
to the number of subleaders... You can invite people to join your team, change the slogan, design the emblem, uniforms, and team dollar
board, and appoint other members as subleaders. To appoint another team member as a sub-leader, go to the team list in the
communication window and select "Make sub- leader...". You can only revoke a subleader's subleadership rights if the team's leader...

62278.「チームクエストなどを こなしていくと\n 人と同じように チームも経験値を得て:
As you complete team quests, your team will gain experience and level up, just like other people. As your team level increases, you'll
be able to use more features and purchase more items... To learn more about what's possible when you reach a higher team level,
talk to your ambassador and click on "Next Level Perks"...

62279.「それでは 依頼内容の\n 達成状況を 確認させていただきます……。\n<bw_:
Allow me to check to see if you've completed
any of our requests...
<bw_break>

62280.「達成した依頼は 以上となります。\n 翌朝には 新しい依頼に 更新されますので:
And that's all for the requests you've
completed. They will update the following
morning, so be sure to check them.
<bw_break>

62281.「……どうやら 今のところ\n ご報告の必要がある依頼は なさそうですね。\n:
It seems that you have nothing to report at
the moment. We look forward to your future
reports.
<bw_break>

62283.チーム『<%sL_TEAM>』の\nチームレベルが <%dL_LV>にあがった！:
The Team Level of <%sL_TEAM> has
increased to <%dL_LV>!
<me 57><end>

62284.「『<%sL_QUEST>』クエスト達成を\n 確認いたしました！\n ご協力感:
I've confirmed your completion of the
"<%sL_QUEST>" quest!
We thank you for your cooperation!
<end>

62286.「他に ご報告が必要な依頼は なさそうですね。\n 引き続き ご報告を お待ちし:
I see you have no other requests to report.
We look forward to your continued
cooperation.
<bw_break>

62287.「制限時間が過ぎた依頼は 変更しました。\n さくせんコマンドの 『チーム』の\:
The requests with expired time limits have updated. Please check them using the "Team Quests" command.
If a quest had expired and was just updated, it will now offer more Team EXP than it did before.
These quests will have their Team EXP displayed in orange, so be sure to check them out as you are able.

62289.「チームクエストへの 参加希望ですね。\n では いくつか説明いたしましょう。\:
I'd like to join Team Quest. Let me explain a few things. Team Quest is a national request, so you can't choose what you want to do, but
you can request multiple things at once. The requests can be shared with all team members by going to Team Quest in the Team section of
the Operation Command... If you successfully complete a request, one of your team members must report it to our team ambassador. Each
request has a deadline. If the request is not completed by the deadline, it will be considered a failure. If your request is
overdue, please report it to us and we will update it with a new request... If you don't report it, it won't be renewed, so please be
careful... As you complete requests, your team will gain experience and level up... As you level up, you'll find more team features,
more items to purchase... And that's it. If you have any questions, please ask for clarification...

62290.<pc>は さくせんコマンドの\n『チームクエスト』が使えるようになった！\n<:
<pc> can now use the "Team Quest"
command!
<me 71><end>

62291.「<pc>さんは\n まだ チームに 所属されていませんね。\n<br>\n「で:
<pc> You are not yet a member of a team. Well,
I'll be happy to explain more once you're on
the team.<bw_break>

62292.「チームクエストとは 我々チーム大使が\n 国家から受けた要請を 公認チームの皆:
Team Quest is a request that we, the ambassadors of Team Quest, have received from the state, and we'd like to submit it to you,
the official team, as a quest. It's a national request. You can choose what you want. But there can be multiple requests at
the same time... The requests can be shared with all team members... by going to Team Quest under Team in the SES command. Review
the request and work together to complete it... Whenever a request is successfully completed, one of your team members will
report it to our team ambassador... Each request has a deadline. If the request is not completed by the deadline, it will be
considered a failure. If your request is overdue, please report it to us and we will update it with a new request... Please note
that requests will not be renewed without a report...

62293.「チーム対抗戦用説明テキスト？\n （仮テキストです）\n<br>\n「今後 ア:
Text for a team competition? （There may come a day in the future when we need the help of every team in Astoltia... In that case, our
team ambassadors will inform all of Astoltia of our cooperation. We will inform you of the nature of the request as it arises, so please
come to our team ambassador if you wish to help... And in the event of such a request, we will be offering a special gift to the
team that does the best job. It's a great way to get your team's name out there in Astoltia. We'd love to have you join us.

66747.チーム結成時に払った 登録料\n<%dL_TESUURYOU>ゴールドが 戻って:
The <%dL_TESUURYOU> gold I paid to form the
team is back...

Adventurers, welcome to the... In response to the current crisis in the world, many major nations have decided to strengthen their
teams. And so our ambassadors have decided to issue a national request in the form of a quest to teams around the world. You've already been briefed on Team Quest. If you have any questions, please use the "Ask a Question" link...

I'll be sending in a team quest right away.
I'll be waiting to hear from you, sir.<end>

69653.「すでに <pc>さんの チームには\n チームクエストを 依頼しております。\:
already<pc> I've requested a Team Quest from your team. I
look forward to hearing from you, sir.<bw_break>

69654.<select_se_off>\nチームの手続き\n盾カバーをはずす\n説明を聞:
<select_se_off>
Team Settings
Remove Shield Cover
Explanation
<select_end><break>

69655.チーム『<%sL_TEAM>』は 新しい\nチームクエストの依頼を受けた！\n<:
<%sL_TEAM> received some
new Team Quests to undertake!
<se_nots System 7><end>

69656.「チームクエストの 手続きをします。\n 何を お望みでしょう？\n<break:
Certainly. Which would you like to do?
<break>

69824.<select_se_off>\nクエストを報告する\n次のレベル特典確認\n<:
<select_se_off>
Report Quests
Check Next Level Reward
<select_end><break>

69825.<select_se_off>\nリーダーを交代する\nエンブレムデザイン\nユ:
<select_se_off>
Replace Leader
Emblem Design
Uniform Design
<select_end><break>

69831.「チームを解散するには チームメンバー数を\n １名の状態にする必要があります。:
In order to dissolve a team, it must be reduced to one member... When you disband your team, you will be refunded your original
registration fee. When you disband a team, all of the team levels you've built up over the years will be lost, so please make your
decision carefully...

69922.「チームの手続きから ユニフォームデザインを\n 選ぶと チームメンバー全員が着:
If you choose a uniform design from the team procedure, you can design your own uniform for all team members to wear... Only team
leaders and sub-leaders who have reached team level 5 or higher can design uniforms... To wear the uniform, open the game screen and
selectThat's right. Regardless of your equipment, you'll always look the same in uniform... As your team level increases, you'll have more
and more uniform types and colors to choose from...

69923.「冒険者よ よく来てくれました。\n 現在 世界の危機に対抗するため 主要各国は:
Adventurers, welcome to the... In response to the current crisis in the world, many major nations have decided to strengthen their
teams. So our team ambassadors have decided to make a national request in the form of a quest for teams around the world. To
participate in a quest, simply speak to one of our team ambassadors and select "Team Quest"... Remember, each member of your team
will need to complete this process individually. So what can I do for you today?

70149.「現在 次のレベルアップ特典は\n 準備中となります。\n しばらく お待ちくだ:
The next level-up offer is currently being
prepared... We'll keep you posted...<bw_break>

72725.「チームリーダーの引き継ぎとは\n 長期不在の チームリーダーから\n リーダー:
Team leader succession is the process by which a team leader who has been absent for an extended period of time assumes leadership
of the team... Team leader succession is subject to strict conditions set by the team ambassador... First, a team leader who has
not logged in for more than 90 days can take over... New team leaders will be appointed by our team ambassadors from members who have
logged in within the last two weeks, with preference given to sub-leaders... Once a request is accepted, it cannot be
cancelled... Please use your best judgment before making a request... Would you like me to take over as Team Leader of your team
<%sL_TEAM>?

72726.「取り消しは できませんが\n 本当に よろしいですか？\n<yesno 2><:
I can't take it back. Are you sure you want
to do this?<yesno 2><break>

72727.「それでは チームリーダーの状態を\n 確認いたします……。\n<bw_bre:
I will now confirm the status of the team
leader...<bw_break>

72728.「チームリーダーが 長期不在ではないため\n 引き継ぎを おこなえませんでした。:
As the team leader is not available for an extended period of time, he will not be able to take over... I'll be able to take over in
a few days...

72729.「チームリーダーが 長期不在ではないため\n 引き継ぎを おこなえませんでした。:
As the team leader is not available for an extended period of time, we are unable to take over... I should be able to take over
within the next day...

72730.「チーム情報の取得に 失敗いたしました。\n お手数ですが しばらく時間を空けて:
We're sorry, sir, but we're having trouble retrieving your team information. I apologize for the inconvenience, but please give it
some time and try again.

72731.「チームリーダーの 長期不在が確認され\n <%sL_PC>が 新たなチームリー:
Due to the extended absence of the team leader, <%sL_PC> has been appointed as the new team leader... We look forward to the
continued success of <%sL_TEAM> with their new team leader...

72732.「チームリーダーの引き継ぎとは\n 長期不在の チームリーダーから\n リーダー:
Team leader succession is the process by which a team leader who has been absent for an extended period of time assumes leadership
of the team... Team leader succession is subject to strict conditions set by the team ambassador... First, a team leader who has
not logged in for more than 90 days can take over... New team leaders will be appointed by our team ambassadors from members who have
logged in within the last two weeks, with preference given to sub-leaders... Once a request is accepted, it cannot be
cancelled... I urge you to exercise discretion before making a request...

74051.「チームリーダーが 長期不在ではないため\n 引き継ぎを おこなえませんでした。:
The team leader is not available for an extended period of time, so we're unable to take over... It'll be a while before we can
take over...

74690.「チームの登録料を お返ししようとしたのですが\n どうやら お金を持ちきれない:
I tried to give you back your team's registration fee, but it looks like you don't have enough money. I'll get back to you when
I have less money.

91831.「<pc>さん よく来てくれました。\n 『チーム集会所』の機能は すでに\n:
Thank you for coming. Are you already using the "team meeting place" feature? The Team Gathering Place is a feature that allows you
to set up a team meeting place in the leader's or sub-leader's home... Once a team meeting place is set up, the entire team can
instantly move to the team meeting place, which is very convenient. And to make it even more convenient to use, we've decided to
provide you with a special Zoomstone! This "Team Gathering Place Stone" will not disappear even if you leave the team, but it
can only be used while you're a member of the team. Also, you can only travel to the Team Gathering Place, and you cannot use another
team's Team Gathering Place Stone... That's it for the brief explanation... You can read more about it by clicking "Listen". Now,
please pick up your rocks...

91832.<pc>は チーム集会所の石を\n手に入れた！\n<me 60><end>: <pc> got the stone from the team meeting place!<me 60><end>

91833.「チーム集会所とは リーダーか\n サブリーダーの家を チーム集会所に\n 設定:
A team meeting place is where you can set up a team meeting place in the leader's or sub- leader's house. You can only set up one team
meeting place... Once a team meeting place has been set up, all team members can lull themselves into the meeting place. To do so,
select the team meeting place stone or the "Go to Meeting Place" option from the team menu in the "Strategy" section... To set up a
meeting place, the leader or sub-leader must go to their house and select "Set Up Team Meeting Place" from the administration
menu... The stones in the team meeting place do not disappear when you leave the team, but they can only be used when you are part of
the team. Also, you can only move to one Team Gathering Place... and you cannot use another team's Team Gathering Place stone...

91834.「チームメンバーを さそう時は\n さくせんコマンドの 『チーム』から\n おこ:
If you wish to send a team member, please do so from the "Team" section of the Operation Command... If you wish to change the team
leader or emblem, or disband the team, please contact one of our team ambassadors... Please note that we have an agreement that any team
ambassador from any country can handle team procedures... Now. I have something for you... First, I'd like you to take this...

91835.「リーダーか サブリーダーの家を\n 『チーム集会所』に設定すると チーム全員が:
If you set the leader's or sub-leader's house as the team meeting place, the whole team will be able to lull themselves into the
meeting place. You can do this by selecting either the Team Gathering Place stone I gave you or the "Go to Gathering Place" option in
the Team menu... For more information, go to "Listen to Explanation"... That's all for now! Have a great team life!

92283.「……<pc>さん 少々お待ちください。\n 『チーム集会所』の機能は すでに\:
One moment, please... Are you already using the "Team Gathering Place" feature? The Team Gathering Place is a feature that allows you
to set up a team meeting place at the leader's or sub-leader's house... Once a team meeting place is set up, the entire team can
instantly move to the team meeting place, which is very convenient. And to make it even more convenient to use, we've decided to
provide you with a special Zoomstone! This "Team Gathering Place Stone" will not disappear even if you leave the team, but it
can only be used while you're a member of the team. Also, you can only travel to the Team Gathering Place, and you cannot use another
team's Team Gathering Place Stone... That's it for the brief explanation... You can read more about it by clicking "Listen". Now,
please pick up your rocks...

122950.報告が 失敗しました。\n時間を置いて もう一度お試しください。:
The report failed... Please give it some time
and try again...

173743.「あっ……申し訳ありませんが\n チーム名の 先頭か 末尾に\n 空白が入ってい:
Oh... I'm sorry, but we can't accept your team name... because it starts or ends with a blank space. Please enter a different team
name...

276218.「チームドルボードの変更を ご希望ですね。\n 手数料として <%nL_GOLD:
I'd like to change my team's dollar board...
I'd like to charge you <%nL_GOLD> gold as a
commission, if that's okay.<yesno><break>

276219.「ドルボードの変更が できませんでした。\n しばらく 時間を空けてから\n も:
I can't change the dollar board... Give it
some time and try again...<bw_break>

276220.「タイプとカラーを組み合わせて\n あなたのチームの ドルボードを\n 作ってく:
Combine types and colors to create a dollar
board for your team...<bw_break>

276221.「これを 『<%sL_TEAM>』の\n ドルボードにしますか？<yesno><:
Do you want to turn this into a "<%sL_TEAM>"
dollar board?<yesno><break>

276222.「かしこまりました。\n これは すばらしいドルボードです。\n メンバーの士気:
Yes, sir... This is a wonderful dollar
bill... I'm sure it'll boost the morale of
the team!<bw_break>

276223.「チームの手続きから ドルボードデザインを\n 選ぶと チームメンバー全員が変え:
If you choose the dollar board design option in the team procedures, you can design your own dollar board that all team members can
change... Only team leaders and sub-leaders who have reached team level 15 or higher can design a dolphinboard... You can change the
form of the dolls by going to the dolls form settings in the Operation command, or by going to the custom shop in Gakuto Gatara and
asking Decory to change the form of the dolls. As your team level increases, you'll be able to choose from more and more
dolphinboard types and colors...

276747.「ドルボードデザインを やめますか？\n<yesno 2><break>: Do you want to stop designing dollar boards?<yesno 2><break>
